sentences.sentence: Famous agriculturalist Yuan Longping said they would grow a special rice.
sentences.translation: 著名农学家袁隆平说，他们将种植一种特殊的水稻。

sentences.sentence: In 2003, Dutch agriculturalist Marc DE Ruiter saw dairy farmers in windswept Shanxi province literally pouring their milk down the drain because there was not enough demand.
sentences.translation: 2003年，荷兰农学家雷一鸣看到，风中山西省奶农，在把实实在在的牛奶倒进了水沟里，因为那里没有足够的需求。
